Field.name: BillOfLadingWaybillNumber1
Field.comment: Identification number assigned to the shipment by the carrier or consolidator

Field.name: CustomsEntryTypeCode
Field.comment: Code defining the type of entry assigned by U.S. Customs

Field.name: CustomsEntryNumber
Field.comment: Automated Commercial System Code Furnished by U.S. Customs Service

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Time
Field.comment: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

Field.name: DispositionCode
Field.comment: Code advising the carrier or port authority about postings to a bill of lading

Field.name: BillOfLadingWaybillNumber2
Field.comment: Identification number assigned to the shipment by the carrier or consolidator

Field.name: EquipmentInitial
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: LocationIdentifier1
Field.comment: Code which identifies a specific location

Field.name: LocationIdentifier2
Field.comment: Code which identifies a specific location

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: TimeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the time. In accordance with International Standards Organization standard 8601, time can be specified by a + or - and an indication in hours in relation to Universal Time Coordinate (UTC) time; since + is a restricted character, + and - are substituted by P and M in the codes that follow

Field.comment: Code which identifies a specific location

Field.comment: Code which identifies a specific location
